ygData.subject: Electrum Bladed Wakizashi Quest?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello fellow Dark Elfs, I m new to the Shadowknight onelist.  Glad to be aboard.  I noticed Chris Rosset said something about the Electrum Bladed Qakizashi
ygData.messageBody:
Hello fellow Dark Elfs, I'm new to the Shadowknight onelist. Glad to be
aboard. I noticed Chris Rosset said something about the Electrum Bladed
Qakizashi Quest. I've never heard of this quest nor this sword. Could
someone give a brief description of where i can get the quest... i would
like to try it.
-----Original Message-----
From: Chris rosset <litespdr@...>
To: shadowknight@onelist.com <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, July 18, 1999 3:22 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Dark elf faction


>From: Chris rosset <litespdr@...>
>
>Does anyone know how to raise up your dark elf faction? i was a victim
>of a groupmate slaying a DE sergeant a while back and am stuck at
>threatening to all the guards. I want to try the electrum bladed
>wakizashi quest but need to get into neriak to accomplish it.
>
>thanks
>
>
>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
